name: IndianAnthem
0:
”Alexa, ask indian anthem to start the anthem”
”Alexa, ask indian anthem begin the anthem”
”Alexa, ask indian anthem to play the anthem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian anthem
des:
This is a patriotic skill which plays Indian National Anthem. This skill can be used in schools, colleges or any public place to ask alexa to play the Indian national anthem. 

This skill is supported on all alexa enabled devices. You can Alexa to play the anthem, pause and resume the anthem.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
